thread.title: We have sown in tears, now to reap in joy – Femi Adesina
thread.title_full: We have sown in tears, now to reap in joy – Femi Adesina

author: adekunle
title: We have sown in tears, now to reap in joy – Femi Adesina
text:
Home » News » We have sown in tears, now to reap in joy – Femi Adesina We have sown in tears, now to reap in joy – Femi Adesina On 8:53 pm In News , Politics by adekunle Comments 
The Special Adviser on Media & Publicity to President Muhammadu Buhari Femi Adesina has said that things will work for Nigeria and Nigerians. 
Adesina on his twitter account said that Nigerians have sown in tears and now is the time to reap in joy. adekunle
